content: this square is the first in the series of squares designed and named for my grandchildren my youngest granddaughter lauren rose is active inquisitive and so darn smart i made a blanket using nine squares joined and designed a border that came from my heart both mini and large size squares are included **check out the beautiful bag by amjanssen /people/amjanssen ** difficulty level is advanced beginner to intermediate the 11 revised square has 39 stitches per side gauge is not important so use any yarn and applicable hook that you please thank you to all my wonderful testers **order the ultimate granny square sourcebook at meteoor books 1 ** **join my facebook group ~ a yarn of serendipity crochet group 2 links to all my patterns are found on my blog 3 or pinterest 4 ** 1 http //www allcrochetpatterns net/books/the-ultimate-granny-square-sourcebook/ partner=ayarnofserendipity 2 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity 3 http //pknightonhaener wordpress com 4 https //pin it/g7fcaloku2wutj
